forecast.wind: South to southwest 4 to 5 locally 6, veering westerly 5 to 6 with gusts to 35kt by mid-afternoon, perhaps occasionally 7 mid-channel this evening.
forecast.sea: Slight to moderate with a low swell, increasing rather rough to rough in the north and west of the area by mid-afternoon.
forecast.weather: Rain, drizzle, mist and a risk of fog patches, clearing by early afternoon, then isolated showers developing.
forecast.visibility: Moderate to poor, perhaps locally very poor, becoming good by early afternoon.
